_header: A tale hear now thee shall / According to our Mater all
_description: Wife who hung her husband’s shirt by her bed, in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle — in couplets

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
A tale heere nou ȝe schalA cordynge to vre Mater
                    al…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Þat he vs bringe wiþ him to lendeIn to his Blisse
                    wiþ outen ende. Amen.
BodEngPoeta1.Attributed Title:
Hou a wyf ongede hoere husboundes scherte at hoere bed forto haue moynde
                    off hym (f. 185rc)
